verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> again to me, saying, <WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against <WH413> the Ammonites, <WH1121> <WH5984> and prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> them;

And say <WH559> to the Ammonites, <WH1121> <WH5984> Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> you said, <WH559> Aha, <WH253> against <WH413> my sanctuary, <WH4720> when <WH3588> it was profaned; <WH2490> and against <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> when <WH3588> it was desolate; <WH8074> and against <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> when <WH3588> they went into captivity; <WH1473>

Behold, <WH2005> therefore <WH3651> I will deliver <WH5414> you to the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> for a possession, <WH4181> and they shall set <WH3427> their palaces <WH2918> in you, and make <WH5414> their dwellings <WH4908> in you: they shall eat <WH398> your fruit, <WH6529> and they shall drink <WH8354> your milk. <WH2461>

And I will make <WH5414> Rabbah <WH7237> a stable <WH5116> for camels, <WH1581> and the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5984> a couching place <WH4769> for flocks: <WH6629> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

For thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> you have clapped <WH4222> your hands, <WH3027> and stamped <WH7554> with the feet, <WH7272> and rejoiced <WH8055> in heart <WH5315> with all <WH3605> your despite <WH7589> against <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel; <WH3478>

Behold, <WH2005> therefore <WH3651> I will stretch <WH5186> out my hand <WH3027> on you, and will deliver <WH5414> you for a spoil <WH957> to the heathen; <WH1471> and I will cut <WH3772> you off from the people, <WH5971> and I will cause you to perish <WH6> out of the countries: <WH776> I will destroy <WH8045> you; and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> that Moab <WH4124> and Seir <WH8165> do say, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> is like to all <WH3605> the heathen; <WH1471>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold, <WH2005> I will open <WH6605> the side <WH3802> of Moab <WH4124> from the cities, <WH5892> from his cities <WH5892> which are on his frontiers, <WH7097> the glory <WH6643> of the country, <WH776> Bethjeshimoth, <WH1020> Baalmeon, <WH1186> and Kiriathaim, <WH7156>

To the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> with the Ammonites, <WH1121> <WH5984> and will give <WH5414> them in possession, <WH4181> that the Ammonites <WH1121> <WH5984> may not be remembered <WH2142> among the nations. <WH1471>
And I will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> on Moab; <WH4124> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> that Edom <WH123> has dealt <WH6213> against the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> by taking vengeance, <WH5359> and has greatly offended, <WH816> and revenged <WH5358> himself on them;

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will also stretch <WH5186> out my hand <WH3027> on Edom, <WH123> and will cut <WH3772> off man <WH120> and beast <WH929> from it; and I will make <WH5414> it desolate <WH2723> from Teman; <WH8487> and they of Dedan <WH1719> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword. <WH2719>

And I will lay <WH5414> my vengeance <WH5360> on Edom <WH123> by the hand <WH3027> of my people <WH5971> Israel: <WH3478> and they shall do <WH6213> in Edom <WH123> according to my anger <WH639> and according to my fury; <WH2534> and they shall know <WH3045> my vengeance, <WH5360> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> the Philistines <WH6430> have dealt <WH6213> by revenge, <WH5360> and have taken vengeance <WH5359> with a despiteful <WH7589> heart, <WH5315> to destroy <WH4889> it for the old <WH5769> hatred; <WH342>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2005> I will stretch <WH5186> out my hand <WH3027> on the Philistines, <WH6430> and I will cut <WH3772> off the Cherethims, <WH3774> and destroy <WH9> the remnant <WH7611> of the sea <WH3220> coast. <WH2348>

And I will execute <WH6213> great <WH1419> vengeance <WH5360> on them with furious <WH2534> rebukes; <WH8433> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD, <WH3068> when I shall lay <WH5414> my vengeance <WH5360> on them.
